title: Ep: 038 - The Philosphy of Creativity with Architect Rick Staub
description:
In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down with Rick Staub, Architect and Co-Founder of Your Modern Cottage. The conversation focuses heavily on the foundations of art and creativity and how those concepts are applied to the design environment.

More from Rick: 

Your Modern Cottage: https://yourmoderncottage.com/ 

Website: https://www.pointonearchitects.com/ 

Thanks for listening
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
